Articles.Content:
Okay my current computer stats are as follows.

Amd Athlon 64 Dual Core 2.8 GHz

Nvidia Geforce 210 1GB VM :-[

3GB DDR2 400MHz Ram :-[

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My upgraded computer will have as follows.

Edit:AMD Athlon II Triple Core 3.2 GHz FAN INCLUDED

Edit: Geforce 430 GT 1GB VM

8GB DDR3 1333MHz Ram
Lucky you! Have fun gaming... I have 512mb ram...

Good luck gaming on a 550ti.

That card\'s a piece of shit.

Good luck gaming on a 550ti.

That card\'s a piece of shit.

I read that, and for some reason, burst out laughing. ???

Lucky you! Have fun gaming... I have 512mb ram...

Eh I have 2 gigs but my other computer has 4 gigs. (It has a 64-bit processor.)

I might look into getting a gaming computer...

I might ask my parents if I can sell my android tablet since it lags on most apps...

It\'ll be good for businesses though.
Changed the list a little. THE NEW LIST IS ONLY $233!

I\'ve got 4Gb of RAM, and that\'s good.

My graphics card is a Intel HD Graphics. Can barely play anything above Minecraft or KSP. And of course, no game would ever want to have mediocre graphics, because graphics is everything to gamers! (sarcasm)

My current computer is a HP laptop.

I5 2.4ghz

Two crap graphics cards

4gb ddr3 ram

Though I have anouther computer that I want to upgrade.

My current computer is a HP Compaq Desktop.

Specs:

ATI Raedeon 3100 graphics card.

12.21GB out of 74.53GB

Microsoft Windows Vista Business OS

AMD Sempron Processor - 2000MHZ

(OOPs my computer mistakes my RAM..)

1.75 GBs RAM.

To sum this up I have a bad computer

I also have a family PC..
My current computer is not working. > Gotta get a 64- bit disc and wipe the hard drive.
